short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension to inject a AgentBuilder chatbot on any pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instructions for using AgentBuilder ChatBot extension:

1. Create AgentBuilder application configuration, click on "Embed" in the application overview, switch to the Chrome browser extension installation view, click the copy button to get the Chatbot URL.
2. Click "Save" and confirm the prompt to successfully configure.
3.Restart the browser to ensure that all pages are refreshed successfully.
4. AgentBuilder chatbot floating bar can be loaded normally on any page in Chrome, if you need to change the chatbot, just change the Chatbot URL.
